name: Hydro Grip Dewy Long-Lasting Setting Spray With Hyaluronic Acid + Niacinamide
about: What it is: A non-sticky, alcohol-free, dewy setting spray with a microfine mist that sets makeup for up to 12 hours, so skin stays glowy and makeup doesn't fade...Finish: Radiant..Formulation: Lightweight Spray..Skin Type: Normal, Dry, and Combination..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Blue Agave Extract (Blue Agave Grip Phase): Sets makeup to prevent melting, fading, and creasing..- Hyaluronic Acid and Niacinamide (Vitamin B3): Hydrate, and refresh skin for a dewy finish that doesn't look or feel greasy..- Hemp Seed Extract and Aloe: Calm, soothe, and add moisture for a visibly dewy glow...Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free...What Else You Need to Know: This skincare-supercharged formula is packed with makeup-gripping blue agave extract, hydrating hyaluronic acid, and glow-boosting niacinamide to lock in makeup for up to 12 hours. Use it as a hydrating mist or apply between each layer of makeup (like foundation and blush) for maximum longwear...Clinical Results: In a consumer perception study of 20 people in a 12-hour period:.-100% said it helps lock in makeup + lasts for 12 hours.-95% said skin immediately looks hydrated + refreshed.-90% said makeup looks better and stays on better...
ingredients: - Blue Agave Extract (Blue Agave Grip Phase): Sets makeup to prevent melting, fading, and creasing. .- Hyaluronic Acid and Niacinamide (Vitamin B3): Hydrate, and refresh skin for a dewy finish that doesn't look or feel greasy. .- Aloe and Hemp-derived Cannabis Seed Extract:  Calm, soothe, and add moisture for a visibly dewy glow...Water (Aqua, Eau), Hydrogenated Ethylhexyl Olivate, Caprylyl Methicone, Octyldodecanol, Isononyl Isononanoate, Isopropyl Palmitate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Seed Extract, Agave Tequilana Leaf Extract, Prunus Avium (Sweet Cherry) Flower Extract, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Orchis Mascula Extract, Coccinia Indica Fruit Extract, Solanum Melongena (Eggplant) Fruit Extract, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Flower Extract, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Leaf Extract, Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Seed Oil, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Niacinamide, Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Vegetable Amino Acids, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Unsaponifiables, Maltose, Sodium Phytate, Glycerin, Erythritol, Methyl Gluceth-10, Pentylene Glycol, Polyester-5, PVP, Sorbitol, Propylene Glycol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Amber Powder, Homarine HCl, Hydroxyacetophenone, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Acetate, Benzoic Acid, Dehydroacetic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Blue 1 (CI 42090).....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Shake well before using. .-Hold bottle eight to 10 inches away from face and mist evenly onto skin. Close mouth and eyes while spraying. .-Let set for 60 seconds. .-Reapply throughout the day as needed to refresh skin and boost hydration. .-Pro Tip: For longer-lasting makeup, start your routine with Hydro Grip Primer (sold separately).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm absolutely amazed by this dual-phase setting spray! After using it throughout my day, I can confidently say that my makeup truly lasted the full 12 hours as promised. The clinical results weren't lying - it really does lock everything in place immediately!  What I love most about this spray is how it gives my skin this beautiful, glassy glow. The combination of hemp-derived cannabis seed extract, hyaluronic acid, and niacinamide provides incredible hydration and keeps my skin looking dewy and fresh all day long. The green cannabis glow phase adds that extra boost of hydration that really locks in the moisture.  As someone who appreciates clean beauty, I'm thrilled that this is an alcohol-free formula. The natural aloe scent is subtle and pleasant, and I love that I can refresh my makeup throughout the day without any sticky residue.

reviews.review_title: Hydrated, Glowy Skin with Milk Makeup Hydro Grip
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using the Milk Makeup Hydro Grip Set + Refresh Spray for a few weeks now, and Iu2019m obsessed! Itu2019s super hydrating, thanks to the hyaluronic acid, and the niacinamide helps smooth and brighten my skin.  I love that itu2019s a 3-in-1 product:  As a primer, it grips my makeup perfectly.  As a setting spray, it locks everything in place with a natural, dewy finish.  And as a refresher, it instantly wakes up my skin throughout the day.  The spray feels lightweight, and it doesnu2019t leave my skin sticky or greasy. I also appreciate that itu2019s vegan and cruelty-free. My only tip is to shake it well before using it to activate the dual-phase formula.  If youu2019re looking for a long-lasting, hydrating setting spray, this is definitely worth trying!u201d

I used the setting spray with the Milk Primer and I absolutely loved the way they both made my foundation go on flawlessly! It was lasted all night long and my makeup did not budge what so ever! I 10/10 recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Milk Makeup. As someone who has oily skin, I tend to want to mattify my makeup looks, but with the heat and with the potential opportunity to sweat, a dewy setting spray actually makes more sense. I wore it two nights in a row in two very different settings. The first night, out to dinner with my little ones which can be a lot of work. The second night with my girlfriends and the restaurant was a little on the warm side. My makeup didn't slide, but I also didn't look super greasy. I will say if you have oily skin it definitely depends on how oily you get. The dewy look may not be for you, but I actually enjoyed it and didn't want to take my makeup off at the end of the night. I've also been having trouble with under eye creasing so I sprayed some of this on my beauty blender which definitely helped with setting my under eyes. I plan to continue using it; it's actually a really great amount for a travel size. I also appreciate the slight shimmer that it has. This is my first time ever using a product from milk; so far so good. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_title: Believe the hype with this setting spray!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was kindly gifted the Milk Makeup Hydro Grip Set + Refresh Spray (Travel Size) for my honest review and I canu2019t lie, I get the hype - Iu2019m super impressed and really like it! It simultaneously leaves your skin looking hydrated, refreshed, gives that glow from within feel, all while setting your makeup in place! (The photo on the left is before I applied the setting spray and the photo on the right is after I applied). Itu2019s not sticky, itu2019s lightweight,  and I feel like my makeup looks better the longer I have it on! Itu2019s literally all in the name, it grips onto your makeup for long wear and hydrates your skin all in one! Because I have combination skin, after about 7-8 hours of wear, I have to slightly touch up my t-zone (which is no qualm at all, itu2019s the norm for me!), while the rest of my face looks glassy not greasy! Will definitely be repurchasing once I run out!

reviews.review_text: While this setting spray is quite moisturizing and smells good, I honestly feel like it melts my makeup off after a long day. If you only need your makeup to last a few hours and want a super dewy finish, then this is the perfect setting spray. However, I have tried this setting spray a number of times, and at the end of the workday, my makeup looks super patchy and muddy. All my contour looks streaky and inevitably my mascara rubs off and leaves marks below my eyebrows, which doesn't happen with other sprays such as the Milani make it last. Also, it seems like there is some oil within the spray that separates, so you have to make sure you shake the bottle before use. Again, great spray for light, dewy, 5-4-hour makeup, but not good for a full day of makeup.

reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve heard so many people recommend this setting spray. After using it and testing to see how it wears all the day , itu2019s just basic for me. Although it didnu2019t makeup my makeup last throughout the day like it should with setting spray. It also didnu2019t give me a dewy finish. Overall it is an okay product.

This setting spray made my makeup stay on all day! Iu2019ve been looking for a refreshing setting spray that is Alcohol-Free and holds my makeup for the whole day and this did exactly that! I also love how clean this product is!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore the Milk Cosmetics Hydro Grip Set and Refresh Spray! From the moment I tried it, I knew it was a game-changer for my makeup routine. Not only does it keep my makeup in place all day long, but it also gives my skin a refreshing boost of hydration. The lightweight formula feels amazing on my skin, and I love how it helps to minimize the appearance of pores. Plus, the convenient spray bottle makes it easy to use on-the-go. Overall, this spray has become a must-have in my beauty arsenal, and I can't imagine my routine without it!
